thread.title: First Mongolian mono play international festival kicks off
thread.title_full: First Mongolian mono play international festival kicks off

author: The UB Post
title: First Mongolian mono play international festival kicks off
text:
Thursday, October 1st,   First Mongolian mono play international festival kicks off 
By B.BAATAR 
The Parade of Winners, the first Mongolian mono play international festival, will be held in Ulaanbaatar from September 30 to October 6. Artists from Mongolia, Germany, Latvia, Moldavia, Sweden and Kyrgyzstan will attend the festival. The organizer of the festival and artists of the Mongolian State Academic Theater of Drama, Ts.Bayasgalan, said, “We named the festival The Parade of Winners, because winners of international mono play festivals are participating in the festival. Mongolian artists have a chance to learn from international artists, promote mono play to the public and take part in international festivals. The festival is not a competition, but a chance to exchange experiences with international artists.” The festival started at the State Puppet Theater yesterday. The closing mono play of the festival will be “Book”, based on Johann Wolfgang Goethe’s Faust tragic play. Artist of the State Academic Drama Theater, D.Odgerel, will perform “Book”.
